profile:
OGC - Ottawa General Contractors are leaders as Ottawa's design and build renovation experts. Specializing in home renovations, new and custom home construction as well as home design. With our project management and coordination, we're able to efficiently juggle more jobs, large and small, without dropping the ball. 

Ottawa General Contractors are an accredited business with the Ottawa BBB and our CEO, Moe Abbas is a former member of the board of directors for the Better Business Bureau (BBB).. Our skills and expert service has allowed us to expand to other cities in Canada including Vancouver and Calgary in less than 8 years making us one of the fastest growing construction companies. 

We offer warranty following the Tarion warranty guidelines for all our renovations and construction projects. We also have a design center and in house designers available to help you design and build your home. With over 50 years of experience, our team has the knowledge, the tools, the skill-set and the resources to give you the best value for your dollar at unbeatable service. 

We at Ottawa General Contractors understand that you are looking for value with your renovation services. Trust our team to do it right the first time! Call us directly at (613) 225-9991!

Visit our website for all our credentials and more information.

Ottawa Construction & Ottawa renovation expert services:

Basement Renovations
Additions & Sun Rooms
Home Construction
Ottawa Home Renovations
Home Renovations in Ottawa
Kitchen Renovations
Bathroom Renovations
General Home Renovations
Home Architects
Home Builders

Custom House Builders

Ottawa General Contractors - leaders in home renovations. Have you worked with us?  Leave a review!

profile:
Holland Homes and Renovations is Ottawa’s preferred home renovation and home addition contractor. As the recipient of the 2017 Consumer Choice Award for Home Improvement Contractor in the Ottawa area, we know the importance of delivering the highest level of customer service and value for your home renovation or addition. 

Serving the Ottawa area since 2010, we specialize in tailoring each project to the customer’s budget and specifications. We strive to provide a seamless experience as the customer deals directly with the owner and project leader every step of the way. 

We don’t make it complicated: our focus is on you and your vision. That means not only a more personal, direct experience, but a more affordable one as well. 

From budget to design to finalization, we specialize in all areas of home renovation: home additions, basement renovations, zoning and project approval, kitchens and bathrooms, roofing, windows, painting and flooring. If the project calls for it, we can handle it. 
 
Visit our website to view customer testimonials, project inspiration and our frequently updated blog on the challenges, regulations and benefits of home renovation in Ottawa. 
Contact us today and let’s get started on your home renovation dreams in Ottawa!

profile:
Founded in 2018, GrandCor is a construction project management company featuring a management team with over 20 years of experience providing bespoke, cradle-to-grave construction and building solutions as well as property management for a diverse range of commercial, retail and public sector clients across Canada. 
.
GrandCor embraces complexity across the project lifecycle and differentiates itself as an organization through an unapologetic focus on execution for the exclusive benefit of our clients. GrandCor's defining qualities as a leader in construction project management include: 

  • Transparency and client-focus ‒ Providing our clients with best-in-class service and outcomes is driven by our transparent approach to client engagement where we “do what we say and say what we do.” Anything less is unacceptable. 
  • An established track record ‒ GrandCor has an established track record of performance in providing tailored construction and building service solutions and project management engagements for diverse clients across their entire project lifecycle. 
  • A forward-thinking approach ‒ GrandCor’s key differentiating feature is its forward-thinking approach to its operations, implementing cutting edge technology, design trends and development techniques. We provide the most creative solutions for the unique specifications of each client. 
  • An experienced team ‒ GrandCor’s management team features over 20 years of comprehensive construction project management experience across Canada, with deep exposure to the full project construction lifecycle. We have encountered a complex range of commercial and residential projects of varying stage, scale and performance 
.
The GrandCor team looks forward to addressing your specific project-based needs and exceeding your expectations on-time and on-budget. We have a broad range of client references available upon request. In addition, we offer first-time client incentives in and no-obligation estimates. 
.
For more information and a comprehensive overview of our capabilities and projects, please contact us at info@GrandCor.ca and visit our website: http://www.GrandCor.ca

profile:
OakWood is a Design Build firm that provides high-quality renovation services to the Ottawa area. A Fourth generation, family run company with over 60 years of experience. We are Award winning - and the only Ottawa renovator to win the Consumers Choice Awards for Best Home Designer and Best Home Renovator eight years in a row. 

Mike Holmes Certified Renovator: OakWood is the first Renovator in Canada to meet the stringent requirements set out by the Holmes Group. 

OakWood uniquely combines craftsmanship from a bygone era with state-of-the-art CRM and advanced project management and planning tools. This, combined with over half-a-century of experience, is why we can promise you a high-quality home renovation that is always completed on-budget with no “surprises”. 

Our experience spans over a wide range of residential projects including kitchens, basements, bathrooms, sunrooms, in-law suites, additions, and custom-built homes. Whatever type of renovation you are planning, we can provide you with examples and many customer references that speak to our quality and reliability.

profile:
A husband-and-wife team, Justin and Katie are passionate about interior design and construction. They love taking something that appears old and worn out and bringing it back to its original character while giving it a modern touch.


Justin has been in the construction industry for more than 15 years. He started out as subcontractor for a local business, building custom homes, apartment complexes, and condominiums. During this time, he also started his own business in which he renovated and constructed properties. He was also able to deconstruct and start from the bottom up.



Meanwhile, Katie remained at home to raise their four children. She admits to becoming wildly obsessed with HGTV, Pinterest, and home design. Then 2 and a half years ago, they took their love for home design further by purchasing an old Victoria house that was on the verge of ruin. They restored it back to its original character and added modern flairs.


Justin’s talent for building and Katie’s eye for design were their motivations in establishing their own home design business. They look for homes that need design improvement and revamp them while keeping the original characteristics of the property. For them, what is considered by some as a lost cause may still be transformed into something beautiful, homey, and comfortable.

profile:
DDR is a renovation company that creates distinctive living spaces in partnership with our clients. We believe that our work is art—we see your house as a canvas to work on and we use our tools as our paintbrushes. We believe in teamwork and working in close contact with our clients, to achieve that picture-perfect result. In our ten years of business, we have developed bonds with our clients and consider many of them our friends.

DDR is a business of distinctive renovations built on referrals, and many of our clients hear about our exceptional work from their friends, or are repeat customers themselves.

We don’t just build living-spaces; we also build friendships.
